mahajana pusthakala mangin janathawata wadath paladayi sewawak labadimata palanadhikariya katayuthu kala yuthu yayi kalaniya wishwawidyalaye mahacharya em. ee. pi. wirasinha mahatha biyagama-makola pawathi gampaha disthrikkaye pusthakala adhipathin ha karyamandala puhunu wadamuluwakadi pawasiya.kalaniya wishwawidyalaya pusthakala wignyapana adhyayana anshaye meheyawimen sanwidhanaya kala mahajana pusthakala prawardhana wadamuluwa biyagama pradeshiya sabhawe manawa sampath, praja sanwardhana anshaya mangin sanwidhanaya kara thibuni.thawaduratath katha kala mahacharya wirasinha mahatha, shri lankawe mahajana pusthakala atharin kauthukagara pusthakalaya wishalama pusthakalayayi.

emenma adala sakakaru apa matha muda harimen pasuwa “adhikaranaya magahara yamata awakashayak nomathi bawata” apa matha muda harina awasthawe di pradhana mahesthrathwariya wisin pamina thibu nigamanaya da dosha sahitha bawa mahadhikarana winisuruwaraya siya thiranaya prakashayata path karamin kiya sitiya.
emenma bahuthara bauddhayo rohingya wasiyanta purawasibhawaya labadima da prathikshepa karana athara eeta dadi wirodhayak ella karathi.

ee nisa mata wishala mudalak thibune naha.

edata amma gigamane yanawa " somasirige deneth athare koluwath maha muhudath adurath madiwi atha.
eeth sar kiwwe "oyalage ammala thaththala mekata salli gewala thiyenne payak nikan innada?"
